price: Walizikadhibisha Ishara zetu zote, nasi tukawashika kama anavyo shika Mwenye nguvu Mwenye uweza.
arabic: كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُمۡ أَخۡذَ عَزِيزٖ مُّقۡتَدِرٍ
footnotes: Walikadhibisha Ishara zetu na miujiza yetu waliyo kuja nayo Mitume wetu. Tukawaangamiza kwa maangamizo ya nguvu yasiyo shindika, ya uwezo mkubwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kadhabū biāyātinā kullihā fa-akhadhnāhum akhdha ʿazīzin muq'tadirin
